channel.title: [FM] Poker Mafia Class cards
channel.description:
I made some changes to poker mafia classes for future poker mafia games. Differences from the first poker mafia classes:
* All classes are able to get abilities from the pool. * Townies and mafiosos will be able to choose a gift at the start of the game (see below for the gifts they can choose from). * Most gambling events have been removed and replaced with the "Roulette". * There are still daily events, but they no longer involve gambling (see the events section for more information). * All classes can use more than one day or night abilities, but they must pay 3 tokens for every extra ability besides the first one. (You can't use the same ability multiple times). * Godfather no longer needs to use tokens to kill. * Godfather no longer buys abilities for his mafiosos, he buys them for himself. * There are 8 different ability types: Support, Offensive, Social, Investigative, Killing, Gambling, Passive and Scum. There are also certain classes with starting abilities. These abilities will appear as "Special" to investigators.
**Available gifts:** >* **Abilty gift**: Start the game with a random, non-golden ability. >* **Token gift:** Start the game with 3 extra tokens. >* **Golden gift:** Start the game with a Golden ticket. At the start of the game, one person with a golden ticket will be selected at random and get a free Golden ability. (Golden abilities are powerful one-shot abilities).
**The Roulette** Gambling related events have been replaced with the roulette. The roulette is available all days and offers you the chance to buy tickets for it. There is no limit on the amount of tickets you can buy every day. The roulette lasts for the first 24 hours of the day. Each ticket costs 1 token.
**Available tickets:** > **Common tickets:** These are used to bet on the results of the roulette. All 3 common tickets are available every day. > * **Color ticket:** Pick red or black. If you are right you win 2 tokens. > * **Number ticket:** Pick a number between 1-3. If you are right you win 3 tokens. > * **Full ticket:** Pick a number between 1-3 and a color. If both are right you win 6 tokens. > > **Rare tickets**: Out of everyone that buys these tickets, only 1 of them will get a price. Only 1 of these will be available each day. > > * **Jackpot ticket**: Every token used to buy tickets from the roulette will be added to the jackpot (roulette tokens count as normal tokens for this purpose). The winner ticket will get all the money in the jackpot. > * **Golden ticket**: The winner ticket will get a golden ability. > * **Special ticket**: The winner ticket will get a special token.
**Selling abilities:** The way selling an ability works has been changed. You can now choose an ability to sell and it will go back into the ability pool. People will be able to bid for said ability like normal, but the tokens from the highest bid will go towards the seller.
Class cards: [details="Class cards"]
> <big>[color=green]**Townie**[/color]</big> > **Town** > Choose a gift at the start of the game. (Townies can't get scum abilities from gifts). > **Goal: Defeat Town and the neutral killer**
> <big>[color=red]**Mafioso**[/color]</big> > **Mafia** > Choose a gift at the start of the game. > **Goal: Defeat Town and the neutral killer**
> <big>[color=red]**The Godfather**[/color]</big> > **Mafia** > **Filthy Rich (Passive)** - Immune to death at night. You get 3 extra tokens every day. You can give any amount of tokens to your mafiosos. Only the starting Godfather has this passive. > **Pass the torch (Passive)** - If you die, a mafioso of your choice will become the Godfather. > **Kill (Night)** - Attack a player. Unlimited uses. > **Goal: Defeat Town and the neutral killer**
> <big>[color=gray]**The Gambler**[/color]</big> > **Neutral** > **Lucky (Passive)** - You get 3 roulette tokens every day. (Roulette tokens can only be used to buy tickets for the roulette). > **Safe Bet (Night)** - Become immune to death tonight. Unlimited uses, but costs 10 tokens to use. > **Goal: Survive**
> <big>[color=005050]**The Loan Shark**[/color]</big> > **Neutral** > **Bribe (Passive)** - You are immune to death at night. If you are attacked you will give your attacker half of your tokens instead. > **Loan (Night)** - Give a player any amount of your tokens. Said player will be "In debt" until they pay you twice that amount of tokens. You cannot use this ability on a player that is already "in-debt" - Unlimited uses. > **Collect (Night)** - Occupy all "In debt" players and make them lose 1 use of all their abilities. > **Goal: Get a total of 30 or more tokens. If you win, you will leave the casino and all players will lose 5 tokens.**
> <big>[color=lightgreen]**The Leprechaun**[/color]</big> > **Neutral** > **Broke (Passive)** - You start the game without tokens. >**Lucky 7 (Passive)** - Start the game with a random non-golden ability of each type except killer. (Support, Social, Offensive, Investigative, Passive, Gambling and Scum). These abilities cannot be sold. > **Goal: Survive to see town lose**
> <big>[color=FF0080]**The Entertainer**[/color]</big> > **Neutral** >**Last present (Passive)** - Whoever kills you will get a random Golden ability. If you are lynched, the first person to vote you will get it. > **Birthday present (Day)** - Give a present to a player. They can open it or give it to someone else. Whoever opens it will get a random ability. 3 uses. > **Exploding Present (Day)** - Give a present to a player. They can open it or give it to someone else. Whoever opens it will die. 1 use. > **Magic Trick (Night)** - Swap places with another player. Anyone visiting one of you will instead visit the other. Unlimited uses. > **Goal: Survive**
> <big>[color=brown] **The Cheater** [/color]</big> > **Neutral Killer** > **Ace under the sleeve (Passive)** - Start the game with 3 Special tokens. > **Cheating death (Passive)** - Immune to death. > **All-in (Night)** - Kill a player. Unlimited uses. > **Goal: Defeat the Town and Mafia**
> <big>[color=Gold] **The Elite** [/color]</big> > **Neutral Killer** > **VIP (Passive)** - Start the game with a Golden Killing ability of your choice. You cannot sell this ability. All of your Golden abilities have unlimited uses but a 1-day cooldown. > **Untouchable (Passive)** - Immune to death.
> **Goal: Defeat the Town and Mafia** [/details]

What do you guys think about this change?

Selling abilities:
The way selling an ability works has been changed. You can now choose an ability to sell and it will go back into the ability pool. People will be able to bid for said ability like normal, but the highest bid will go towards the seller.

Basically instead of getting a fixed amount of tokens for selling an ability you would get the tokens from the highest bid.

item.title: [FM] Poker Mafia Class cards
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
I don’t want to completely remove faction-specific abilities, but I do want to reward people that spend their tokens denying abilities to their enemies instead of getting abilities from themselves. If reroll isn’t the best solution, I’ll try to think of another way to do it.
I tried to do this in the first poker mafia with the ability to sell your abilities back, but no one seemed to use that feature except for the neutral killer, who had the ability to see all bids as they happened.

item.title: [FM] Poker Mafia Class cards
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
How about adding a new mechanic to the game?

Reroll: Whenever you get a new ability, you can pay tokens to change it for a random one.

  • You cannot reroll passive abilities.
  • You cannot reroll abilities if you have used at least 1 charge.
  • The first reroll is free, but the price increases by 3 tokens for every reroll.
  • You cannot get golden abilities when rerolling.
  • If you reroll a golden ability, you will get 2 common abilities instead.

This would actually give a reward to players that use their tokens to deny an ability that would otherwise be useless for them.
